div.h2: SNOMED CT Qualifier For Type of Diagnosis Codes

div.p: This value set includes all the "Qualifier for type of diagnosis" SNOMED CT codes (i.e. codes with an is-a relationship with 106229004: Qualifier for type of diagnosis).
